scripts.staging: yarn cypress run --config-file ./config/staging.json --spec 'cypress/integration/Test/Basicworkflow.spec.js,cypress/integration/Test/devTest.spec.js,cypress/integration/Test/payments.spec.js,cypress/integration/Test/myCar.spec.js,' --browser chrome --headless --reporter cypress-multi-reporters configFile=reporterOpts.json overwrite=false,html=true,json=true
scripts.report: yarn cypress run  --config-file ./config/staging.json --spec 'cypress/integration/Test/Basicworkflow.spec.js' --browser chrome --reporter cypress-multi-reporters configFile=reporterOpts.json overwrite=false,html=true,json=true
scripts.test: yarn run report && yarn run slack
scripts.smoketest: yarn cypress run  --spec 'cypress/integration/Test/devTest.spec.js,cypress/integration/Test/payments.spec.js' --browser chrome --headless --reporter cypress-multi-reporters configFile=reporterOpts.json overwrite=false,html=false,json=true
